name: Hatsune Miku Jigsaw Puzzle
overview: Many cute illustrations of Miku and her friends! Let's play Hatsune Miku Jigsaw Puzzle! Multiplayer jigsaw puzzle has been released! You can play on your own, or share controllers with your friend and play up to 2 players co-op! 39 illustrations are available! Choose your favorite illustration and play the jigsaw puzzle! ◆Choose from 3 different sizes! Anyone from kids to adults can enjoy the puzzles! You can select the difficulty of all the puzzles by choosing from 3 sizes: Easy (63 pieces), Normal (130 pieces) and Hard (300 pieces).
